content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this pocket pal kitty cat is sure to be a favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70196a skill level easy wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in oxford grey & fisherman* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers polyester fiberfill some construction required to finish shown with 70195a crochet puppy 1 70191a make it yours pocket pal blanket 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crochet-puppy-70195a 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/make-it-yours-pocket-pal-blanket
